q: Senate. Bill Lockyer said many Democrats are worried about appearing to threaten voters by presenting a`` cuts only'' budget, but said voters need to know what it would mean to the state. The hit on K-12( schools) is at least close the schools six weeks a year. Voters need to hear that, he said. Earlier this month, Jerry Brown proposed a$ 127.4 Bill Lockyerion spending plan for the 2011-12 fiscal year. It includes deep cuts to higher education and services for the poor, disabled and elderly.

It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Larry Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a`` tremendous leader'' whose contributions exceeded all expectations.`` There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done,'' Larry Page said.

regrets of another domineering defense secretary-- the late Robert McNamara -- who came to describe the Vietnam War as`` terribly wrong.''`` That's not the case with Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld countered. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the Al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he added, insisting the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the September 11, 2001 attacks on the United States was`` incremental,'' not rushed.
